frankies.name: Frankie's Java House
frankies.description: A cafe next to South Beach Harbor.
frankies.welcome_message: This is the closest place to grab some food.

frankies_front_door.name: Frankie's Front Door
frankies_front_door.welcome_message: This is the entrance to Frankie's, the closest place to grab some food.

south_beach_harbor.name: South Beach Harbor
south_beach_harbor.description: A harbor south of the western span of the Bay Bridge at Pier 40. Home to BAADS, the Bay Area Association of Disabled Sailors.

south_beach_dingy_dock.name: The Dingy Dock
south_beach_dingy_dock.description: The dock where the BAADS small boat program operates.

south_beach_gate_1.name: Gate 1
south_beach_gate_1.description: An entrance on the north side of the South Beach Harbor docks.

south_beach_gate_2.name: Gate 2
south_beach_gate_2.description: An entrance on the northwest side of the South Beach Harbor docks. The main gate where BAADS keelboat participants meet and the easiest point of access to the keelboat program slips

south_beach_gate_3.name: Gate 3
south_beach_gate_3.description: An entrance on the southwest side of the South Beach Harbor docks, south of the Harbor Building.

south_beach_gate_4.name: Gate 4
south_beach_gate_4.description: An entrance at the south end of the South Beach Harbor docks, located off the Fishing Pier at Pier 42.

south_beach_fishing_pier.name: Fishing Pier
south_beach_fishing_pier.description: A great place to feel the breeze and watch the boats entering the south end of the Harbor.

south_beach_harbor_building.name: Harbor Building
south_beach_harbor_building.description: The South Beach Harbor Building houses the Harbor Masters Office, the Yacht Club, and most importantly... the Bathrooms.
south_beach_harbor_building.welcome_message: Welcome to the South Beach Harbor Building!

south_beach_harbor_side_entrance.name: Harbor Side Entrance
south_beach_harbor_side_entrance.description: The main entrance to the South Beach Harbor Building located on the East side of the building towards the harbor.
south_beach_harbor_side_entrance.welcome_message: Welcome to the main entrance of the South Beach Harbor Building!

south_beach_parking_lot_side_entrance.name: Parking Lot Entrance
south_beach_parking_lot_side_entrance.description: The entrance to the South Beach Harbor Building from the parking lot located on the West side of the building towards Oracle Park.
south_beach_parking_lot_side_entrance.welcome_message: Welcome to the South Beach Harbor Building!
